backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing user profile management and contact form submission system with role-based access control using MixinAuthorization; includes admin-only endpoints for viewing submissions and public guest-accessible contact form submission.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files including React components, hooks, configuration, and pages for an insurance broker website with admin panel functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color space for consistent design tokens across the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with meta tags, title for Jonathan Ayan Insurance Broker Website, and root div mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with homepage and admin routes, wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider, and composing the homepage from multiple section components with decorative dividers.
frontend/src/components/ChildBenefitsSec: Section component explaining benefits of child life insurance policies, highlighting tax-free wealth building and compounded interest growth with decorative navy gradient background and gold/accent-blue styling.
frontend/src/components/CompaniesSection: Section displaying logos of five A+ rated insurance carriers plus a '+25 other carriers' card, with explanatory text about independent broker advantages including unbiased recommendations and competitive rate shopping.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form component with validation for insurance inquiries, collecting user details (name, state, age, gender, product interest, coverage amount) and preferred contact time/day. Handles form submission via useSubmitContactForm hook and displays success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying company information (Equity Insurance Partners), contact details, services list, and copyright notice with a link to the admin page and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component featuring Jonathan Ayan's professional headshot, title, and call-to-action buttons that scroll to the contact section, with a Miami skyline background image and gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that toggles between login/logout states using Internet Identity, handles authentication flow, and clears query cache on logout.
Services section component displaying two cards for Life Insurance and Annuities with descriptions, features, and decorative icons on a gradient background with pattern overlay.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control with admin token and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout flow, identity state, and login status with configurable options for idle behavior and identity provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile management, admin checks, and contact form submission with actor-based backend communication and extensive logging.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for an insurance-themed UI using navy, gold, and accent blue colors with light/dark mode support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin panel page component that checks authentication and admin status, displays contact form submissions in a table, and handles user profile setup with Principal ID display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom insurance brand colors (navy, gold, accent-blue, slate) using OKLCH color space and design system tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata indicating a fix request to replace an incorrect whitelisted Principal ID in the backend admin whitelist with the correct one.
